long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creates a 3d graph of websites based off a root URL, allowing the user to view the web in a new way. Inspired by The Web Stalker, this extension pushes back on the standard for searching and viewing the web. Upon selecting a site from the interactive graph, the site can be fetched and viewed as raw html.
